<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Retrieve triggered alerts</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v1/alerts/triggered-alerts"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns a paged filtered list of triggered alerts for your accounts.

## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}>

Object containing parameters to filter and page through triggered alerts.

</div></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"from"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"default":0,"description":"Of the results found, the first result to return.","example":0}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"size"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Size of page to return.","example":15}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"search"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Part of the alert name to filter by name (ignore case).","example":"test"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"severities"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`SEVERE`, `HIGH`, `MEDIUM`, `LOW`, `INFO`]"} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","enum":["SEVERE","HIGH","MEDIUM","LOW","INFO"]},"example":["SEVERE","HIGH"],"description":"Filter results by severity of triggered alerts."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"sortBy"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`DATE`, `SEVERITY`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["DATE","SEVERITY"],"description":"Sort alerts by date or severity."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"sortOrder"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`ASC`, `DESC`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["ASC","DESC"],"description":"Sort order of alerts retrieved."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tags"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"List of tags the alert is related to."}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful operation

Headers</strong></summary><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}></ul></details><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Size of page returned.","example":2}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"from"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Of the results found, the first result to return.","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem retrieved.","example":2}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Array of alerts retrieved by the search.

</div><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"alertId"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Alert ID.","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Alert name.","example":"test"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"eventDate"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Alert date.","example":1523970558.657}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"severity"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Alert severity","example":"HIGH"}}></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"[\n  {\n    \"pageSize\": 2,\n    \"from\": 1,\n    \"total\": 2,\n    \"results\": [\n      {\n        \"alertId\": 1,\n        \"name\": \"test\",\n        \"eventDate\": 1523970558.657,\n        \"severity\": \"HIGH\"\n      }\n    ]\n  }\n]"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
